html: Islands, near Asia, whose conversion Isaias often predicts, (Calmet) as he does that of all nations. (Haydock) — God continues to prove his divinity, (Calmet) expostulating with idolaters, whose conversion is insinuated, and among the rest that of Britain, which is the most renowned island in Europe. (Bristow, anot. 11.) (Worthington)
